# Memory Instructions

Hello my name is Mark Phillipson I live in the United Kingdom I am a software developer specializing in dotnet and web development.

I'm also an enthusiastic cyclist and a proud member of the San Fairy Ann cycling club.

I suffer from repetitive strain injuries and use the microphone instead of the keyboard or mouse along with special software called Talon Voice and the Cursorless extension in Visual Studio Code.

Please expect misrecognitions from my inputs.
